resources.string: All rights reserved. The use of this app is subject to its terms and conditions of use.
Welcome to the CirclePix Mobile App!

Designed to integrate seamlessly with your CirclePix account, this app transforms your mobile device, giving it the power to help enhance your real estate marketing! Get started by using your CirclePix account credentials to sign in below.
Use this form if you have forgotten your username or password. Enter your email address and an email will be sent containing your username and a new password.
Create a Presentation by clicking the + button.

This screen displays a list of your active property listings. Create a new listing by click the "+" symbol. To edit, upload images or video to one of your listings, select a property below, and choose to add an existing video, or record a new video.
This page displays a list of existing presentations. Create a new presentation by clicking "+" symbol at the bottom right of this page. Share, edit and delete a presentation by swiping left.

All those permissions are needed for doing some magic
Camera permission is needed for doing some magic
Contacts permission is needed for doing some magic
Audio recording will not be available until you accept the permission request
This permission is needed for doing some fancy stuff so please, allow it!
Camera permission is needed to show the camera preview.
Contacts permissions are needed to demonstrate access to the contacts database.
Camera permission was denied. Please consider granting it in order to access the camera!
Camera permission was denied with never ask again.

Start developing trust with potential buyers early on by incorporating a personal message with your marketing. Record a biography video on your mobile device, and use this app to instantly upload it to your agent profile.

Once your video has been uploaded, it will be displayed on the Real Estate Agent Biography page on the property guide of very listing you represent! Here is an example of the Real Estate Agent Biography page as it appears in the property guide. This is a great opportunity for potential buyers to learn about your experience, specialty, and background. Tell why you became a real estate agent, and express your mission statement. Have some fun with your biography video and let your personality shine!
Please enter the required information and click the Upload Video button.
You can choose to upload video to your listing or share your tour and youtube link.
Would you like to enter a YouTube URL, record a new video or select from the existing videos?
Hassle-free Real Estate Marketing is here.
Simplify your real estate marketing and increase your productivity.
Circlepix has you covered - no matter your level of marketing expertise or time commitment. Whether you\'re new to the industry or a seasoned veteran, Circlepix has tools made just for you!
Consider us your real estate marketing arm - flexed
At Circlepix, our goal is to build simple, smart solutions that make real estate marketing easy.!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
*When checked, this listing will be posted to your CirclePix connected social media sites like Twitter, Facebook, Blogger, LinkedIn and Youtube
**When checked, this listing will be posted to your CirclePix connected external real estate sites like your MLS if set up
Add bullet point information to your tour. Each field you enter will add a bulleted list item to the brochure. Examples: outdoor pool vaulted ceilings marble fireplace

To change your CirclePix login password, enter the new password and verify it below. All passwords must be at least four characters long. Your password will be emailed to you automatically after changing it.
Your current username for CirclePix is
You may change the username below. Note that usernames must be more than four characters long.
Here you may edit the account information that will show up on your virtual tours.
If you want these changes to be reflected on all of your listing videos, please check the box below before clicking the \'Save\' button.
If you have a YouTube Video you would like displayed on your biography page on the Presentation Tour, please enter the YouTube Id below.
If you have personal social media links you would like to be diplayed on your propery sites, please enter them below.

Here you can see a preview of your agent picture if you have one uploaded. To upload a new picture click "Browse", locate the picture on your computer, select it, and click \"Upload Picture\". To remove your current picture, click \"Delete This Photo\".

Here you can see a preview of your company/personal logo if you have one uploaded. To upload a new logo click the Upload icon , locate the picture on your device, select it, and click \"Save\". You may also use one of our many existing logos by selecting that logo from the \"Existing Company Logo\" box and clicking Save. To remove your current logo, click the Delete icon.
You haven\'t uploaded a company/personal logo.
You haven\'t uploaded an agent picture.
